properties.description: A billing instruction used during invoice generation.

displayName.description: The name of the invoice section.
The name of the billing profile.

enabledAzurePlans.description: Enabled azure plans for the billing profile.

invoiceEmailOptIn.description: Flag controlling whether the invoices for the billing profile are sent through email.

poNumber.description: The purchase order name that will appear on the invoices generated for the billing profile.

properties.description: The properties of the role assignment.
The properties of a customer's policy.
The properties of the role assignment.
The properties of the role assignment.

principalId.description: The principal id of the user to whom the role was assigned.

principalTenantId.description: The principal tenant id of the user to whom the role was assigned.

roleDefinitionId.description: The ID of the role definition.

userAuthenticationType.description: The authentication type of the user, whether Organization or MSA, of the user to whom the role was assigned. This is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Enterprise Agreement.

userEmailAddress.description: The email address of the user to whom the role was assigned. This is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Enterprise Agreement.

viewCharges.description: The policy that controls whether the users in customer's organization can view charges at pay-as-you-go prices.

amount.description: The amount budgeted for this billing instruction.

creationDate.description: The date this billing instruction was created.

endDate.description: The date this billing instruction is no longer in effect.

startDate.description: The date this billing instruction goes into effect.

marketplacePurchases.description: The policy that controls whether Azure marketplace purchases are allowed for a billing profile.

reservationPurchases.description: The policy that controls whether Azure reservation purchases are allowed for a billing profile.

viewCharges.description: The policy that controls whether users with Azure RBAC access to a subscription can view its charges.

displayName.description: The name of the billing profile.

enabledAzurePlans.description: Enabled azure plans for the billing profile.

invoiceEmailOptIn.description: Flag controlling whether the invoices for the billing profile are sent through email.

poNumber.description: The purchase order name that will appear on the invoices generated for the billing profile.
